verbose_text: Since PPARgamma activation upregulates the regulators of cholesterol efflux in macrophages XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR and reduces inflammation in atheroma by inhibiting nuclear factor-kappa B activity XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR, this pathway could be an attractive target for treating atherosclerosis.
evidence: PPARgamma activation upregulates the regulators of cholesterol
